cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Interface CommentControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentController

    public interface CommentControllerInterface
    Controller CommentControllerInterface Interface: This interface is for implementing a CommentController.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImg(Image img)
      This method adds/changes the image of the comment.
      void addReply(Comment aComment)
      This method adds a reply comment to the comment.

      This method adds the comment to the cache.

      This method changes the geolocation of the comment.

      This method changes the title of the comment.

      This method is used to favorite a comment.

    • Method Detail

      • addImg

        void addImg(Image img)
        This method adds/changes the image of the comment.
        Parameters:
        img - The new image that will be set in the comment.

      • addReply

        void addReply(Comment aComment)
        This method adds a reply comment to the comment.
        Parameters:
        aComment - The reply of the comment.

      • addtoCache

        void addtoCache(Comment aComment)
        This method adds the comment to the cache.
        Parameters:
        aComment - The comment that will be added to the cache.

      • changeLoc

        void changeLoc(GeoLocation loc)
        This method changes the geolocation of the comment.
        Parameters:
        loc - The new location that the comment will be changed to.

      • editText

        void editText(String text)
        This method edits the comment body of a comment.
        Parameters:
        text - The new text that will replace the old text.

      • editTitle

        void editTitle(String text)
        This method changes the title of the comment.
        Parameters:
        text - The new title of the comment.

      • favorite

        void favorite(Comment aComment)
        This method is used to favorite a comment.
        Parameters:
        aComment - The comment that is favorited.
